normalized: it was finally the start of the battle.
once the guilt was clear, that made everything easier.
receiving a report from shizuru-san and me, a large-scale taimanin corps had been brought in.
seishuu academy had been recognized as an “enemy” that we had to take down.
this was no longer a force infiltration.
it was a raid.
we besieged and attacked seishuu academy with a large battalion.
there were lots of teachers and normal students in the school, who didn't know anything, so needless to say, we made an effort to protect them.
however, just in case, everyone would be taken to the village and examined, to make sure that there were no demonic elements implanted in them.
shizuru-san theorized that most of the students from the elite building were unwittingly being turned into demons.
i prayed that they wouldn't counterattack, being manipulated by the enemy.
if that happened, then although it was pitiful, there was nothing that could be done about it.
the taimanin had no mercy.
the operation had already begun.
the sounds of swords, gunshots and explosions could be heard from all over the school.
and, as the first infiltrator, i was storming the enemy's stronghold, accompanied by a “main force” of new-generation taimanin.

name: yukikaze
normalized: take this!

name: rinko
normalized: hahh!
two people screamed.
lightning and slash attacks crossed paths.
baribaribari!
zusazazazahh!
bonn!
bonn!
two cyborg spiders had been destroyed simultaneously.
one of them, which had taken a ball of lightning to its body, discharged a lot of electricity as it was blown to bits.
having all its legs severed from the base, and, on top of that, even having its head cut off, the other one became a cluster of scattered parts and went quiet.
and those had been the last two in the cyborg spider army.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ha!
no response, huh?!
yukikaze whirled her twin lightning guns around and put them back into their holsters with a satisfied-looking face.

name: rinko
normalized: seriously.
i killed some boring things.
rinko-nee said the sort of thing you would expect from a thief somewhere, and sheathed her trusty sword, “ishikiri kanemitsu”, in its scabbard.
neither of them were even sweating.
in spite of that, a huge number of cyborg spider corpses―no, wreckage―lay scattered before their eyes.
the pair had dealt with those things―which shizuru-san and i had had so much trouble with, and couldn't even beat one of―in the blink of an eye.

name: shizuru
normalized: honestly.
i'm fed up with this…
shizuru-san said, in a tone of voice that seemed more exasperated than impressed.

name: shizuru
normalized: what fighting power… it's preposterous…
shizuru-san and i had our weapons in hand just in case, but we weren't doing anything.
we were just watching the pair's rampage.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it's because those two love a battle… enough to show off… ahaha.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou.
i'm just doing what i have to do.
i do like battles, but that doesn't really mean i'm deliberately showing off.
perhaps because she had heard me back up shizuru-san, rinko-nee knit her brows just a little.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh, yeah.
you're right.

name: yukikaze
normalized: wait a minute, rinko-senpai.
please don't talk like i alone am an attention-seeking show-off.
and tatsurou, too.
yukikaze pouted.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze is a show-off.
whether attention-seeking or not.

name: rinko
normalized: that's right.
you just destroyed an airport recently, didn't you?

name: shizuru
normalized: eh…?

name: yukikaze
normalized: hey, both of you!
shh, shh!
yukikaze hurriedly put a finger to her lips, to plead, 『don't mention that, okay?

name: shizuru
normalized: when you say an airport, was that the case where you two cornered yazaki together?
didn't a bomb the american federation planted blow up?

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh?
th, that's right.
of course it did.
it was because of a bomb from those cowardly american guys.
boom!

name: yukikaze
normalized: and it wasn't a whole airport.
only half the floor got blown up, so it's not showy at all.
it's totally normal.
normal, normal, ahahaha.
shizuru-san made reproachful eyes as she looked at yukikaze, who glossed over everything by making a fake laugh.

name: yukikaze
normalized: w, was that too much after all?
she glanced at me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you're trying too hard.
give it up.

name: rinko
normalized: i got reprimanded along with you for that incident.
be a little more prudent.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hauuh… i'm sorry…
yukikaze shrank her head back like a scolded kitten.

name: shizuru
normalized: i'm astounded…
shizuru-san said, at last.

name: yukikaze
normalized: but, but, this place isn't a public institution.
i mean, it's an enemy stronghold.
today, it's totally okay no matter how badly we destroy it, right?

name: shizuru
normalized: don't forget that this place is underground, okay?
we won't survive if everything above us comes down.

name: yukikaze
normalized: auh… i, i'll be careful…

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah.
do be careful.

name: yukikaze
normalized: how come tatsurou's speaking so self-importantly?
in spite of being tatsurou…
yukikaze whispered, deliberately so that i would hear it.

name: tatsurou
normalized: because today i'm team leader.
i puffed out my chest, and yukikaze theatrically opened her eyes wide.

name: yukikaze
normalized: leader!
tatsurou's the leader!
not the veteran shizuru-san!
wow, now that's self-important!

name: tatsurou
normalized: do you have a complaint?

name: yukikaze
normalized: not reeally…
yukikaze answered, feigning indifference.
her face wasn't satisfied at all.
this girl…

name: shizuru
normalized: but i think it's good that tatsurou-kun is the leader today.
i also recommended it.

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh?
why's that?

name: shizuru
normalized: his detection abilities are proven.
he's perfect for leading an assault like today's.

name: shizuru
normalized: it looks like you guys don't realize it, having come here for the first time, but… tatsurou-kun, you were actually willingly leading the cyborg spiders here, weren't you?
in order to round them all up.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah, well, i figured, “these two are finally here.
might as well have them smash all of these at once.

name: rinko
normalized: i see, is that so?
i thought you had some kind of plan.
not bad, tatsurou.
rinko-nee praised me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you were doing something like that… that's amazing!
come to think of it, games where you lead the enemy and trap them to bring them down were your strong point, weren't they?
yukikaze also looked at me with impressed-seeming eyes.
however, she didn't forget to add,

name: yukikaze
normalized: you know, i thought we'd gotten lost because of tatsurou, since we were going around in circles.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hey…

name: yukikaze
normalized: ahaha, no, no, it's a joke.
sorry, sorry.
yukikaze made it sound like a joke, but there was no doubt from her eyes just now that she was thinking so at least half-seriously.

name: rinko
normalized: this is a case of “pay close attention if you don't see a boy for three days”, isn't it?
i'll leave the guiding to you after this.
the enemy stronghold is close, right?
i feel its jaki.
」(tl: a proverb derived from 14th-century chinese novel romance of the three kingdoms.
it means that if someone trains hard for three days, they will havematured so much as to be barely recognizable, so those who are behind by those three days should observe them closely.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah, it's here, without a doubt.

name: yukikaze
normalized: then, let's go and beat them up quickly.
that's okay, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: of course it is.
let's go.

name: yukikaze
normalized: roger, leader♪
the enemy resistance had increased in severity.
human soldiers, wolf and tiger juujin (beastmen), and even other cyborg weapons besides the spiders attacked us one after another.
yukikaze and rinko-nee―and, of course, shizuru-san and i as well―had had to cross swords with the enemies directly.
the battles had been extremely violent, and also gave me chills sometimes.
however, we eliminated all of them, despite the difficulties, and finally reached the enemy's deepest depths.
an enormous room was there.
the pathway suddenly spread out, and took the form of an atrium-type room.
however, there wasn't the slightest sense of spaciousness in there.
all it had was a feeling of pressure.
it was filled with ominous jaki, and demonic inki was dominating the place.
a heretical temple that had been created deep underground――
in the middle of that “room of darkness” were these guys.

name: washizu
normalized: you went on quite a rampage, didn't you, taimanin?
an elderly man, who had thrown off the mask of kindly old gentleman and showed his evil face, which was appropriate for the nickname of “the youkai”.
washizu shigeru, leader of the washizu group and head of seishuu academy.

name: inui
normalized: lowly taimanin insects…
standing next to washizu, a tuxedo-wearing man with a build like that of a wrestler―that was inui hideo.
it was my first time seeing the real person, but he was an old boy of seishuu academy, and was called the 『legendary valet』.
i had guessed he was probably an enemy underling, and it was just as i suspected.
they both had human forms, but that was a pretence.
it seemed that they didn't even feel like hiding their true nature anymore, and evil filled the shouki that was given off by their bodies.
and behind washizu and inui,
the rubber woman―who was one of the enemy's number, as i thought―was standing in wait like a secretary, beside a young man wearing a school uniform.
that man was kuroi ryuuji, from the scholarship course.
he was washizu shigeru's blood relative, and his grades were always at the top.
i had heard that he was referred to as the scholarship student to end all scholarship students, and he posed as the leader of the school's delinquents…

name: tatsurou
normalized: （the place where he's standing… is that guy the enemy ringleader, not washizu?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （that's right, no mistaking it.
those eyes, that jaki.
he's the leader here, the root of the evil that we have to take down!

name: yukikaze
normalized: one, two, three, four… heh, you've evened up the numbers.
that's thoughtful.
yukikaze said happily, counting the enemies on her fingers.

name: rinko
normalized: which means all the actors are present, huh?
rinko-nee also smiled fearlessly, and placed a hand on her katana.

name: washizu
normalized: silence!
filthy taimanin!

name: inui
normalized: we'll ensure you'll never be able to make cracks again!

name: washizu
normalized: guaahh!

name: inui
normalized: goohh!
washizu and inui both roared.
what came out of their mouths was not a sound a human would produce.
the jaki noticeably increased, and they revealed their true nature.

name: washizu
normalized: this is a land ruled by we inmazoku, an outpost for conquering the human world.
it's not a place that the likes of you taimanin may enter.
washizu clicked his long fangs, which had grown out of his upper lip.
not just his white hair and beard, but all the hair from the surface of his body had disappeared.
his earth-brown body, which had become exposed, looked like a corpse that had crawled out of its grave.

name: inui
normalized: not to mention, this place where you are now is the holy temple where the great inma king lives.
we will make you pay for your crime of setting foot in here without knowing your place!
inui also shouted with a gigantic mouth, the teeth and muscles of which had become completely exposed, as if his head had split in half.

his muscles had already looked like those of a wrestler, but now he was a monster with muscles which had expanded even further than that, and his skin, which also no longer had a single hair on it, was purple, like a drowned corpse.

name: yukikaze
normalized: thanks for explaining in the proper setting.
still, you're not going to keep giving me good memories to take to the grave, are you?
stop, i'm gonna laugh!
yukikaze said, while laughing already.

name: rinko
normalized: human or demon, villains are the same, aren't they?
for some reason, they're keen to talk on and on about their crimes.
frankly, i'm already tired of hearing it.
rinko-nee sighed, with a face that said she was fed up.

name: washizu & inui
normalized: 「you soowws!
the two monsters howled.
they made angry roars, and tried to attack yukikaze and rinko-nee.

name: tatsurou
normalized: not gonna happen!

name: shizuru
normalized: your opponents are us!
shizuru-san and i moved simultaneously.
it wasn't like we were both watching in silence.
we had launched an attack while yukikaze and rinko-nee were chatting with the enemy.
washizu and inui were certainly terrifying.
their strength seemed incomparable to the guys we had fought up to this point.
but the ones to take them on would not be yukikaze and rinko-nee.
those two had to fight the even stronger rubber woman, and the monster kuroi, who was probably―no, undoubtedly―more powerful than that.
yukikaze had said, hadn't she?
it was thoughtful that they had evened up the numbers.
the opponents for these guys would be us.

name: washizu
normalized: wh, what is this?!
thorns?!
thorns, which shizuru-san had surreptitiously crept across the floor, had tied up the former old man's body.

name: shizuru
normalized: a present from me, kouchou-sensei.
as thanks for receiving your hospitality until now.

name: washizu
normalized: you whoorre!
washizu tore the thorns off.
by that time, i had drawn inui towards myself.
what i had done was even simpler.
the moment that the sole of the foot of inui, who had charged at me, touched the ground, i had quickly tugged on the air at that spot.

name: inui
normalized: owahh!
having been tripped up by my wind, inui cleanly flipped over like in an old comedy skit.

name: inui
normalized: gugahh!
the back of his head slammed onto the floor, hard.
surprisingly, the floor was the one that cracked a little.

name: tatsurou
normalized: whoa, that looks painful.
it would be lucky if he were to die, or even faint, from that, though.

name: inui
normalized: ugugugu… you, you inseect!
i'll tear you to pieces!
i'll crush you without leaving even a bit behind!
inui quickly stood up, and scowled at me with eyes that were twisted with hatred.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i knew it.
that would be too good to be true, wouldn't it?
but this was enough.
i had seen yukikaze and rinko-nee heading for the two behind them without hesitation.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you're inma king-kun?

name: rinko
normalized: are you prepared?
kuroi didn't answer.
a thin, sneering smile had appeared on his lips.

name: yukikaze
normalized: nobody likes people who don't respond.

name: rinko
normalized: first off, take this!
a strike in substitute for a greeting.
yukikaze fired one of her lightning guns, and rinko charged forward and slashed at him as if chasing after that ball of lightning.
kuroi didn't even try to move.
got him!
the instant i thought so――
a figure had cut in ahead of kuroi.
bajiih!
giih!
the lightning ball had been sent flying in the wrong direction, and rinko's slash attack had been blocked by metal claws.
the one who had done it was that rubber woman.
she had moved without any prior notice, and defended against the consecutive attacks of yukikaze and rinko.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'd heard they had a sharp pervert, but she really is sharp.
and, really is a pervert.
what's with that outfit?
yukikaze boldly smiled, still readying her lightning guns.

name: rinko
normalized: i see.
she would be too much for tatsurou right now, huh?
the instant her attack had been defended, rinko also quickly took a distance from the rubber woman, without mindlessly pursuing her.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what kind of face do you have underneath those dirty clothes?

name: yukikaze
normalized: after this, i'm going to have a look.
yukikaze faltered just a little.
had she sensed something?

name: rinko
normalized: yukikaze, don't let your guard down.
her appearance is insane, but she's a pretty strong person.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it's all right.
in this world, guys who dress weirdly are only two things: absurdly strong, or absurdly weak.
she's the strong kind.
perhaps because they had decided that they had to take down the rubber woman first, the pair readied their specialized weapons.
seemingly intending to take on both of them by herself, the rubber woman slowly raised her left and right metal claws.

name: kuroi
normalized: wait.
we will be their opponent.
kuroi held the rubber woman back, and began walking forward voluntarily.
the rubber woman stepped back in silence, and bowed her head respectfully.
was she trying to say “as you wish”?

name: yukikaze
normalized: even though you're the last boss, you're coming out already?
that's some good service.

name: rinko
normalized: how about you expose your unsightly true nature, like those guys?

name: kuroi
normalized: we have no need for that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: does the overconfident last boss know he's destined to be destroyed?

name: rinko
normalized: this ishikiri kanemitsu wants the inma king's blood.

name: kuroi
normalized: we will permit it.
you may attack us as you like.
kuroi made a faint smile, and beckoned the pair.
flames of rage flared up in yukikaze and rinko's eyes.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'll do as i like, as much as i like!

name: rinko
normalized: that hubris!
you'd better repent before you die!

name: yukikaze
normalized: だだ！
ゆきかぜが吼えた。
yukikaze shot balls of lightning like a machine gun, from the lightning shooters in both hands.
every one of those had more power put into it than the lightning balls that had smashed the cyborg spiders just before.
a human―no, even most demons would be turned to cinders just from receiving one of them.
tremendous electrical discharges broke out, and the air became ionized, giving off a distinctive smell.
however, without moving even a step, kuroi actually repelled all of the lightning balls with his bare hands.
and not just that.

name: rinko
normalized: yaahh!
yukikaze's attack was diverted, and kuroi even calmly fended off rinko's hurricane of slash attacks with his flesh and blood.
fearsome dark power had gathered in the palm of his hand, which he had held up calmly.
that was acting as an unbreakable shield and protecting against the pair's attacks.
even though he looked the same as a human, he really was worthy of being called the inma king.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ずだだっ！
not even caring that all of her attacks were being defended against, yukikaze continued rapidly shooting lightning balls, as if she were trying to break through it with brute force.

name: kuroi
normalized: those fireworks are just for show, huh?
kuroi said, as if he were making fun of her.

name: yukikaze
normalized: gotcha!
yukikaze smiled in approval.

name: kuroi
normalized: what?
kuroi knit his brows slightly, and that moment,

name: rinko
normalized: don't take us lightly!
rinko had appeared in kuroi's blind spot, a place where there was absolutely no way to escape her slash attack.
she had used yukikaze's barrage as cover, and space jumped with her void escape arts.

name: rinko
normalized: stray blade style “＜butterfly guillotine＞”
rinko unleashed.
a stray blade style secret technique.

name: rinko
normalized: haahh!
by enveloping ishikiri kanemitsu in a spacial leap bubble, she would cut off every part her blade touched by forcing it to jump.
that impossible-to-defend attack was swung downward at kuroi.
however, he displayed a strange, un-human-like evasion.
in an instant, he had made his body transform into an impossible shape, and smoothly dodged the high-speed slash attack.

name: kuroi
normalized: hmph.
kuroi chuckled, with his deformed body.
however, the pair had taken that much into account.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yah♪
yukikaze smacked kuroi's body.
in the same way one would do to surprise a friend one happened to come across downtown.

name: kuroi
normalized: wha?!
kuroi's thin smile changed in surprise.
even though yukikaze had gotten this close to him, he hadn't noticed.
and, yukikaze had unleashed a move that was unavoidable, no matter how he transformed his body.

name: yukikaze
normalized: “＜lightning blast＞”
bashunn!
she willingly made her lightning shooters, which she had pressed into kuroi's body, explosively discharge.
a tremendous blast of lightning arose, centred around yukikaze.
it went through kuroi's entire body, and he became charred black in an instant from the blazing heat.
――or so it seemed.
yukikaze tried to back away in surprise.
however, her hands wouldn't leave.

name: yukikaze
normalized: no way?!
kuroi was grasping her lightning shooters with his scorching-hot hands.

name: kuroi
normalized: we did like this body, but…

name: yukikaze
normalized: th, this guy…!
despite having his entire body burned by the flames of the lightning strike, his look of anger was as cold as ice.
yukikaze was overawed by the unearthliness of that.

name: rinko
normalized: yukikaze, get away!
rinko forced her way in, and flung her blade at kuroi's hands.

name: kuroi
normalized: don't panic.
kuroi suddenly moved his hands away of his own accord.
zashuu!
rinko's strike cut through the air once again.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …hh!
however, because of that, yukikaze had been able to get back.
rinko also took a distance from him.
as one would expect, both of their faces were stern.
that wasn't just because their attack, which promised to be fatal, hadn't worked.
a change was starting to arise in kuroi's body.
the flesh that constituted his human body was wriggling, as if he were squirming in anguish.
overwhelming youki was rising up.
(tl: an aura given off by paranormal beings such as youkai.
something was coming.
something was about to crack open the shell of his human body and emerge.

name: yukikaze
normalized: haha, i have a bit of a bad feeling.

name: rinko
normalized: this guy finally intends to reveal his true nature, huh?
without even appearing to flinch, the pair put themselves on guard.

name: kuroi
normalized: we apologize for looking down on you as insects.
this is your reward.
you may witness our true form!

name: yukikaze
normalized: what a cliche!

name: rinko
normalized: come!

name: kuroi
normalized: kuhahahahahahahahahaha!
loud scornful laughter.
kuroi's body rapidly grew larger, as if his flesh were exploding.
he had finally appeared.
the inma king.

name: tatsurou
normalized: stray blade style, gale fang slash!
i swung my sword downward.
a strong wind was produced from the blade of my sword.
the air swirled violently, and countless vacuum blades attacked inui.
inui sprayed purple blood, as though he had suddenly emitted mist from his entire body.
however――

name: inui
normalized: guhahahahaha!
it's futile, it's futile!
my wind had definitely wounded inui.
his wounds were closing up as soon as they split open.
the mouths of the wounds healed one after another, as if this were some kind of joke.
it was an amazing regeneration ability.

name: inui
normalized: you can only do things like that, huh?
impertinent wind user!

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's because it's all i need to!

name: inui
normalized: if that's the case, you should taste this power, given to me by the inma king!
inui opened his big mouth.
i could see demonic flame arise in his oral cavity.

name: tatsurou
normalized: tch!
i reflexively jumped far out of the way, and protected myself by enveloping my body with wind.
the tremendous flames had been fired at me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: kuahh!
i had been able to avoid a direct hit, but i was scorched by the several-hundred-degree flames, and my movement stopped for a second.
at that point, inui charged.

name: inui
normalized: die!
he punched me with arms which looked like masses of muscle the size of my torso.

name: tatsurou
normalized: guuhh!
the first time, my ninja sword was sent flying.
the second time, i took a hit to the stomach through my wind guard, and was blown away.
i rolled along the floor, and slammed into a wall.

name: tatsurou
normalized: is he really a former human…?
shit…
i had avoided having my internal organs destroyed, but my legs were weak.
i couldn't stand up right away.
i had also suffered burns.

name: inui
normalized: has the power of i, a worthy soldier of the inma king, become clear to you, insect?

name: tatsurou
normalized: a, and with that… you're going to… rule human society…?
inui, who had approached to finish me off, puffed out his chest arrogantly.

name: inui
normalized: the inma king is secretly strengthening his control over human society.
soon, our inma king will take the place of edwin black, and rule the criminal underworld on the surface.

name: tatsurou
normalized: of the edwin black… you had that much power… we're done for, aren't we…?

name: inui
normalized: guhahahaha!
did you finally realize?!
i will ride on that big wave.
me, an inma!

name: tatsurou
normalized: but, you're weak, aren't you?
i said, still slumped along the wall.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i can't really see him taking the kind of guy who emits fire from his mouth, like just now.
that's better suited to a street performance than a battle.

name: inui
normalized: the insect trash refuses to admit defeat!
guaah!
inui opened his ridiculously large mouth, as i planned.
more demonic flames were spewed out than before.
the surging flames stretched out toward me in a straight line.
buwaahh!
they drew an arc in front of my eyes, and then, just like that, did a u-turn and blew into inui's big mouth.

name: inui
normalized: fugoah?!
during our chitchat, i had been forming a small guidance path with my wind.
i couldn't do something like this if i was moving and fighting.
i had been able to because i was lying still after i had taken damage.

name: inui
normalized: guaah!
having ingested the flames that he had spewed out, inui struggled and groaned.
he was about to open his big mouth even wider, to try to somehow spit the flames out again.

name: tatsurou
normalized: as if i'd let you!
in the act of standing up, i skewered inui's jaw from below with a kunai that i had been hiding on my person.
with this, there was no longer any exit for the flames.

name: inui
normalized: obooboobobobobooboohh!
inui's stomach was swelling out before my eyes.
the inside of his body was being burned by the flames that he had spit out.

name: tatsurou
normalized: don't underestimate the taimanin.
i didn't want him to die next to me.
i gently tipped inui over with my wind.

name: shiranui
normalized: ufu…
shiranui oba-san laughed a little, like she enjoyed our unrest, and knelt before the inma king.

name: inma king
normalized: as you said, they are superb.
we will remember them.
mizuki yukikaze, and akiyama rinko…

name: shiranui
normalized: i am grateful.
indeed, she bowed her head reverently.

name: inma king
normalized: before long, we will welcome them into our camp as soldiers.
just as you wish.

name: shiranui
normalized: i'm looking forward to it.

name: inma king
normalized: now, farewell.
we look forward to our reunion.
that man over there, too.
at the end, the inma king glanced at me, then turned around.
shiranui oba-san also followed him in silence.

name: yukikaze
normalized: okaa-san!
yukikaze called to her.
but no more words than that came out.
while becoming flustered, and holding on to her chest like she was distressed, she was desperately trying to put her overflowing feelings into words.

name: rinko
normalized: shiranui-dono, why?!
rinko-nee mustered her own voice in her stead.

name: shiranui
normalized: you've really gotten stronger, yukikaze, rinko-chan.
shiranui oba-san made a captivating smile.
a bewitching smile, which didn't seem human at all.
her figure disappeared without a sound.
along with the inma king, her entire body was enveloped in dark shouki.
she had gone.
shiranui oba-san.

name: yukikaze
normalized: okaa-san!
yukikaze cried, at the top of her voice.
but, shiranui oba-san hadn't waited for her.
she had disappeared with the inma king, leaving her daughter behind.
a wordless scream echoed in the underground room, from which its master had gone.
